name: stock_get_dividend_yield
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yh_finance_v2.
Tool description: 
API description: Fetches the dividend yield for a given stock symbol from the specified region using the RapidAPI service.

symbol.description: Ticker Symbol ( Ex. \\\\"AAPL\\\\" is Ticker symbol for Apple Inc. on the stock market )

region.description: The region code for the stock market (default is 'US'). Allowed values are 'US', 'BR', 'AU', 'CA', 'FR', 'DE', 'HK', 'IN', 'IT', 'ES', 'GB', and 'S'.
